lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in ( relative) wealth in the U.S. and am glad to loan a small ammount of $ to someone who can use it.
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a company in Colorado that trims,removes, sprays and palnts trees.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I am one of the lucky ones who has been given a huge head start in life. Kiva is one of several ways I feel I can do something to alter the imbalance that exists in our world. But I gotta say "WOW!" to Kiva - What an amazing idea!!! Truly Revolutionary.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: investing in people's dreams and futures is a lot more rewarding than investing in gold-plated rims.

lender.name: Bernard
lender.loan_because: Helping people be self sufficient must be the way to go
lender.occupational_info: Just boring office stuff

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: Because this is what I do with my extra money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Jr. High. I'm just having fun.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I've loaned money before, but this seems like a much more worthy cause. It's not always about making money, but helping those that are working hard and deserve access to needed funds.
lender.occupational_info: I design occupant safety systems for the automotive industry; Air Bags and Seat Belts.

lender.name: DragonFly
lender.loan_because: it is a way to give back to the universe...
lender.occupational_info: I maintain a light industrial electronics factory... helping co-workers with production issues.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Helping others find happiness is the only way to find true happiness within yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I run the takeout window of an Outback Steakhouse in central New York.

lender.name: Misti
lender.loan_because: I want to help other mothers make a difference in thier childrens lives and thier community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be able to stay home and raise my children and take care of my husband. In addition, I do a lot of volunteer work for a local domestic violence shelter and an Organization called Choice Humanitarian.

lender.name: Taylor Mountain
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good idea to help out, since we seem to have a leg up over here in the western world.
lender.occupational_info: ATTENDING UNIVERSITY

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: As a doctor, I took care of people one at a time, and grew to delight in it.
lender.occupational_info: For twenty years, I treated babies and children for all kinds of medical problems. I retired after my husband died. Now I write books.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It's awesome lulz
lender.occupational_info: I make sure people don't look at porn in the library.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Currently a student Need loan for my webhosting business as it grows more demands are need.
lender.occupational_info: Administrator of websites. Update Websites Plans. Data Entry for all accounts

lender.name: Channette, Sweden
lender.loan_because: I want to support those who take a leap of faith and take the chanse to improve there current situation.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: We're all in this world together!
lender.occupational_info: I write stories about people with family trouble.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: A little money goes a long way to give these hard-working people the help they deserve.

lender.name: Fabrizio & Chiara
lender.loan_because: “Be the change you want to see in the world.” (Mahatma Gandhi)

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I want to help and make a diference, With a small push a lot can be acomplished!

lender.name: LUCIANO
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Abu Khalid
lender.loan_because: We can all help others, help themselves one step at a time.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who want to support themselves and their own family.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: sometimes we forget that the small stuff adds up.
lender.occupational_info: I sell stuff in NYC.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I am able.
lender.occupational_info: studying

lender.name: Drew Ann
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. - Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I teach functional life skills to young adults with special needs, and I love it!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: “Give,” said the little stream, as it hurried down the hill; “I’m small, I know, but wherever I go the fields grow greener still.”

lender.name: T, L, K, P, and J
Lee
lender.loan_because: From everyone who has been given much, much will be required; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked.-Luke 12:48

lender.name: BiarneKerstin
lender.loan_because: We are farmers in Sweden and feel we wanna help other farmers around the world.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I want others to join me in feeling the powerful joy in creating and living their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Process Improvement Consultant in the Insurance industry. I'm charged with finding ways to do things better, faster and more cost effectively.

lender.name: Rotary Club
lender.occupation: bankers, health care, retired, auto dealer, farmer
lender.loan_because: "The Miracles of Barefoot Capitalism" by Jim Klobuchar and Susan Wilkes excited us to this world wide movement. Jim recommended Kiva as a way our Rotary Club could make MicroLoans
lender.occupational_info: Rotary's motto is "Service above Self"

lender.name: Nannette
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to fulfill their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university as an admissions counselor.

lender.name: Cherizac
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do; helping each other make our way in the world.

lender.name: Brittney
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give" - Winston Churchill

lender.name: Lourdes
lender.loan_because: I am from a third world country and would like to help others in need. I thank my parents for the sacrifices that they have made to get us where we are today.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a graduate student. I plan on going to nursing school following graduation.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I believe the world will be a better place when all people can have enough food to eat and make a decent living. I want to help in any way I can!

lender.name: Willy
lender.loan_because: I understand how much a loan at the right time can help.
lender.occupational_info: I was a retailer for 35 years growing from a one man operation to a multi store chain.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have met a lot of really strong women through my travels. I would like to repay some of the kindness I have been shown.
lender.occupational_info: I am very lucky in that I sell something that makes people happy, desserts!

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: who wouldn't? it such an easy and interesting way to make help out a little!

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want too..
lender.occupational_info: We are non for profit organization, we donate items to people in need ... If you need anything or knows of people that may need help, please feel free to contact us through our website...

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy learning about the lives of others. And I like having the ability and opportunity to help others improve their own lives through their own efforts.

lender.name: Olgi Zenullari
lender.loan_because: Im willing to give loans (any amount) to the ones who deserve and really need it (especially in webmastering field)
lender.occupational_info: Im a webmaster and I run many online businesses so I would really love helping other's which are at the same field as me.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I want to help a few people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Biology in college.

lender.name: Tamara & Rob
lender.loan_because: Those that wish to rise above should be given a breath of encouragement to support their wings.
lender.occupational_info: United States Air Force

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: I like knowing my loan is going directly to the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: My company makes kits that test people for diseases. If the tests don't work correctly, my job is to find out what the problem is and fix it so doesn't happen again.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world that gives so much to me
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to help people who can't speak properly

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I've been pretty lucky in business and I want to try to help people who want to better their family's situation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a partner in an aircraft parts business. We sell parts for small planes all over the world.

lender.name: Amy & family
lender.loan_because: I want to make a bigger impact and help someone do the same. I introduced the idea to my kids and they are enjoying making a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to find information and how to evaluate what they find.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back to the world. I would like to be part of the solution, not part of the problem. I believe in teaching our future generations to care for one another. Kiva loans are an extended family project. We all derive a lot of joy in sharing. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy life insurance to protect their loved ones.

lender.name: Shang
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance really works!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make informed decisions at critical strategic crossroads

lender.name: Karen Elgin IL
lender.loan_because: Method Inc. Got me started by giving all of us a $50.00 gift certificate to get started. I find it very intriguing how a little bit of money can help all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I organize and coordinate all the production of all of the Method products, I am known as Dr. Filler.

lender.name: David & Dallis
lender.loan_because: we can!
lender.occupational_info:
David owns his own video production company called Adrenaline Productions and Dallis is a full time student working towards a Law Degree.
We also both volunteer and foster for the Southern California Labrador Retriever Rescue. This is an amazing group of volunteers who have saved countless labs! Check out the website at www.sclrr.org!

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to feel like I'm actually helping a person/family instead of giving money to big organizations who use much of the funds to pay for their overhead.
lender.occupational_info: A respiratory therapist is a medical person who helps people with chronic lung problems (adults and babies) by administering oxygen therapy, drug administration and managing mechanical ventilators. I am also a musician who teaches children how to play piano and guitar and boost their feelings of accomplishment and self-esteem.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other. Thank you Jesus.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I have worked in international and community development and I know the impact of self-employment on people's lives not just individually but throughout a community.

lender.name: Julia and Mike
lender.loan_because: We can, and both know how much difference a financial helping hand can make.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and design the clothes that you see people in movies and commercials wearing, he designs the artwork for band posters and CD covers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: i would like to share that of which i have enough of here in Switzerland
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Dipl. multimedia designer offering you my professional knowlage and experience as a visual problem solver, to create for you your custom-tailored design solution.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of something bigger than me, and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Local government

lender.name: Marie-Andrée
lender.loan_because: I want to provide power to anybody who work for it. Power to the people!
lender.occupational_info: I am a system and solution architect who design computer software and Web sites, mostly for governmental agencies in Quebec City.

lender.name: Ms. Kate-land
lender.loan_because: I just do.
lender.occupational_info: I mainly sit and stare out a window.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a comfortable and happy life here in the United States with my mom and dad and want to do a little to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: lots of sleeing, eating, smiling, (and some crying)

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: When I started my Business – I remember how difficult it was to receive financial assistance. Now that I am appreciating success from my many years of hard work, I wanted to share my prosperity with other entrepreneurs to assist them in following their dreams. Hopefully by being generous – my Kiva partners will receive funding allowing them to become more successful and in turn encourage other people to follow their dreams. Peace be with you and good luck!
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of a telecommunications company located in southern Oregon, USA. My company continues to builds a fiber optic communications network to serve the needs of our local and regional schools allowing children to communicate between sites over the internet – at very fast speeds. I have just added a new phone service to my fiber network !

lender.name: Leon
lender.loan_because: I like to help people out so that their dream can come true and their life can be better.

lender.name: Jere/Pam
lender.loan_because: It's what living a good life means---reaching out.
lender.occupational_info: Being and helping others live as global citizens.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help more people in the world become self sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, currently studying Cultural Anthropology in Canada.

lender.name: NailSoupMedia
lender.loan_because: I remember having financial challenges years ago chasing a dream to make life better.
lender.occupational_info: We do real estate web design

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: Its nice to be able to help people help themselves, and micro loans through kiva.org is a fantastic way to do just that!

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I think it can change the world!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I work to conserve the diversity of services that insects provide - from pollination to pest control - and I educate people about how remarkable and important insects are to every part of our lives.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans as a direct means of reaching out to those who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an American worker.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: BAIT Campaign - Ivey School of Business
Jason
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to help people. god has blessed me and i feel like i should pay it forward.

lender.name: Federico
lender.loan_because:
We need to help each other and because i just lost both my grandparents a couple of months ago, and they taught me that we can find happiness when we help others to be happy.
Me gusta mucho colaborar con emprededores de Sudamerica, region que me vio nacer. Si puedo ayudar en otra cosa, solamente contactense conmigo por este lugar. Gracias.
lender.occupational_info: I design for web. I just love what i do. Colors make me feel happy.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: I run an international association for the exhibitions industry with members in 86 countries.

lender.name: Burlington Methodist
lender.loan_because: God helps those who help themselves
lender.occupational_info: small and energetic United Methodist congregation

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: To give opportunity

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I want to help others live a better life.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: It feels awesome to give whatever help I can. I love the Kiva method of helping people grow a business and become self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop websites for all sizes of businesses. I also optimize websites for the greatest search engine results.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a ridiculous amount of abundance in my life. I am grateful for the chance to share it and be a part of someone's life in a profound and positive way
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and work at a university. I paint and help people.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web developer at North Carolina State University

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: It is important to help support and give to one another!
lender.occupational_info: Loving, warm , and repetative.....It is always good to help someone...

lender.name: Harold + Melissa
lender.loan_because: Wii would like to help!
lender.occupational_info: Designers of spaces to meet peoples needs with an artistic and sculptural twist.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to help those that are working so hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for making sure that all paperwork is in order just in case we have an audit. I also order meals and office supplies for my group of 125+ people.

lender.name: Becker Family
lender.loan_because: we want to learn to be great citizens of the world.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because:
People should be given the opportunity to pursue their dreams, but with opportunity should come responsibility. Handouts do not work. As an example of this, witness the large welfare class in the United States. Few are deserving; most are simply lazy and unscrupulous, and have a sense of entitlement which is slowly but surely ruining our nation.
I have traveled extensively, and am continuously impressed by the work ethic, friendliness, and generosity of those who have much less than we do. I hope my loans, and those of others on this site, give these hard-working people the leg up that they need to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I am very fortunate in that I have had multiple careers in my life, and the opportunity and courage to change careers as my interests have evolved.
I am currently a traveler, writer, and 'citizen of the world' who is interested in promoting international understanding and tolerance.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: What I have is a blessing and blessings are meant to be shared with those that are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Mentor, guide and friend to the youth of my community.

lender.name: Paul & Joy
lender.loan_because: I want to help make people financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a company that makes imprinted sportswear.

lender.name: patti
lender.loan_because: we could all use a little help in life
lender.occupational_info: addiction research

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I want to see the world become a little better every time.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, raise my daughter, and work in a large scale grocery store as a manager.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: VAHTC
lender.loan_because: we are a non-profit professional association that believes in promoting cultural diversity and supporting people to maintain local, indigenous traditional skills, practices and lifestyles.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because it's worth it.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am dedicated to supporting men and women around the world help themselves through hard work and dedication.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Nobody can do everything, but everyone can do something.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: ...on behalf of my Political Science 101 students at Point Loma Nazarene University in San Diego.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nursing student wanting to work to help those with hiv.

lender.name: Stefano
lender.loan_because: It is more "personalized" than contributing to huge, albeit worthy, charities.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct field research on social and economic issues in SEAsian countries

lender.name: natasha
lender.loan_because: The joy of giving is addictive. Ive been very fortunate in my life and to give to people making a difference is awesome.
lender.occupational_info: Office work, computers papers, trading stocks.

lender.name: Jenna & Garry
lender.loan_because: everyone needs to start somewhere...

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Work??? I'm retired but there still seems to be plenty to do.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because:
I want to help others in business, but I want to help those that want to work hard and grow a business, but they do not have the resources we have here in the U.S.
God has blessed me and I want to be a blessing to others around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
Our family owns and operates a 24 hour call center where we answer for Drs and Dentists, plumbers and other businesses. We also answer for several county and city agencies. www.PCNanswers.com
My wife and I are involved with Max International. Max has breakthrough health supplements that work. The Owners, the Products and the Compensation Plan are amazing. www.GiveYourMax.com

lender.name: Kamau
lender.loan_because: want to see an original idea come to being
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with innovative ideas that inspire!!

lender.name: Amanda&Jonah
lender.loan_because: making a better world

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea to help in a personal way. Good luck to all the entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Lene
lender.loan_because: I think it's a big chance to make a lttle different for some people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I make advertisment with special fokus on one to one marketing

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I love it!
lender.occupational_info: Hospital nurse

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I think the idea of microloans for self-reliance is a fantastic thing and want to support it.
lender.occupational_info: I edit travel guidebooks and help prepare them to be published.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that everybody can make a difference. Even though I can only share a little bit, it will make a difference for some people on this planet. And that creates good Karma and makes me very happy :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a Secretary. (It's like being a nanny for a big boy ;)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I recognize the importance of access to credit in building wealth and ensuring that a family's needs are met.
lender.occupational_info: I help get homes built that are affordable to people will low incomes.

lender.name: Riku
lender.loan_because: I think it can help people.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: we all rely on each other.
lender.occupational_info: I organize volunteers to fundraise and provide Scouting programs to young men and women around my hometown.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I’ve been blessed by others in my entrepreneurial success and enjoy helping others, even if it is only $25 at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I find jobs for people in the Medical industry who are looking for a change or new career path.

lender.name: Lefa & Tim
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a way for us to give a little bit where we can, and have confidence that our support goes straight to the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: We make magazines about the festivals and events here in our hometown, Melbourne. Tim works for Oxfam and I work for a youth publishing organisation.

lender.name: Leslie, One Space
lender.loan_because: To share the love I've received in the world with others, to help make a difference :)
lender.occupational_info: I've been on a path of integrating the Divine feminine in body and psyche with masculine direction and purpose- Love in action!

lender.name: Kurt Von Weisenstein
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people who are less fortunate than myself. I have been given so many opportunities to better myself and I have, but there are people who rarely get those opportunities because they are not able to get their hands on funding. This is not only a way to give back, but also benefit from others' successes.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Pace University (nyc) who enjoys starting up small businesses, day trading the the stock market, and learning through life experiences.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I know that micro-lending is a great solution to a nagging problem. I'm excited that Kiva gives us the opportunity to contribute. I saw a program on PBS (was it Frontline World?) and couldn't wait to help. I love Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I teach cultural anthropology to college kids who are eager to learn about other cultures and ethnicities.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I'm so lucky to have lived a safe, secure life. It's a very small way I can give someone else a chance.

lender.name: Charles
lender.occupational_info: I design large computer software systems.

lender.name: PaulG
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a little help.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local college developing computer systems to run education related operations.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with my own business and want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I write for web sites and business advertising.

lender.name: Destarte
lender.loan_because: I enjoying helping people who are willing to help themselves. I am also a strong believer in the positive impact successful small businesses have on their communities.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe every person has the capacity to create their desired life, and sometimes need only a little help to launch their successful journey.
lender.occupational_info: My organization mobilizes community assets to improve individual and family life in our community. Assets are financial, people, things.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently earning a degree in journalism through a local college.

lender.name: Craig & Tracy
lender.loan_because: we can

lender.name: Michael Delacroix
lender.loan_because: we can do better.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school during the day full time, and work at night.

lender.name: Luke, Nate, & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have much - and want to share with others.

lender.name: Geert & Els
lender.loan_because: We really believe in this system of lending money. I think that financial empowerment of people in the third world can really help them build on a better future.
lender.occupational_info: We work in the education sector. Geert: teacher in a primary school in Jette, Brussels. Els works with the parents of children in primary school.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person -- one person making a loan or one person with an entrepreneurial spirit to build a dream. Success can be measured in how far you go but it can also be measured by how many you help along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government and strongly believe in public service.

lender.name: lindsay
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Sacred Heart Prep.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Asta and Lummi
lender.loan_because: it was a gift from our friends from the Betty Ford group.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life and this is a way of giving back and paying forward :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school teacher & currently schedule weight loss surgeries from my home.

lender.name: Brian, Andromeda, Tz & A
lender.loan_because: We have been helped by many people and we'd like to help others. We also believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and know how hard it is to achieve financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of four: science educator, author, and two homeschooled students. We all love to travel and learn about the world.

lender.name: Attila
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough that I can.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible for me to connect directly with people making real change in their lives and economic circumstances. Money that would otherwise sit in my bank account can do real and lasting good in the world.

lender.name: Sanni
lender.loan_because: I'm certainly not rolling in money, but I realise that those few extra bucks that I do have really CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I study International Business on a bachelor level, the plan is to graduate in 2010. In addition to that I sell my handcrafted items online.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I want to make resources available to people who might not have access to them otherwise. Kiva is a great way to give people the chance to reach goals they may have previously thought impossible.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering individuals to improve their lives.

lender.name: diana
lender.loan_because: I have a need to be of assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I believe if we reach out to others in love and caring, the world will be a better place.

lender.name: Ajda
lender.loan_because: I like helping hard-working poor people across the globe. Being a student, I cannot afford to donate so loaning is the best way for me at the moment. Thanks, Kiva!

lender.name: luis
lender.loan_because: i love you
lender.occupational_info: yo soy fotografo

lender.name: Anne's family
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: My first priority is taking care of my two boys, ages 2 and 4. I recently started working out of my home. I am an International Recruiter for a Hotel Company. I hire students that attend hotel schools in all parts of the world to come and train in the United States.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I admire the independent spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I build and repair guitar amplifiers and other high-tech equipment.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: I believe that Microfinance can help eradicate poverty by helping individuals create their own enterprise and future.
lender.occupational_info: I am passionate about my work. I have the chance to meet fascinating people around the world and help give their stories a voice so others can understand the issues facing people a world away.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the entrepreneur!

lender.name: Michelle & David
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: We make the world better one word at a time.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want my children to think globally and help others.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I invest in young companies with products or services that are used to generate, distribute or use electricity.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: i am able to

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am loaning for two reasons. As a Christian I am trying to follow the example and teachings of Christ in helping those who need help. As a student of Economics, I understand the need for and potential of capital at reasonable rates.

lender.name: APLUS
lender.loan_because: African American Postal League United for Success (APLUS) was formed in 1987. We want to support and make a difference in the lives of several business owners. We believe in their ability to accomplish their dreams.

lender.name: Jose Manuel
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I make software

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I've got enough already.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college graduate. To make money I work for a retailer's photo department. I develop pictures that people bring in and keep the store tidy. I'm looking around for another job.

lender.name: Verna
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women become independent and happy. I'm very lucky to have what I have, and we all should do everything we can to enrich the lives of our fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital in a small town in Montana, United States.

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: I believe in your work. And I am an enthusiast of Kiva
lender.occupational_info: I work for Ashoka: Innovators for the Public, a citizen sector organisation that supports social entrepreneurs worldwide

lender.name: Seven
lender.loan_because: I want to help enable people to reach their potential and realize their dreams. I can't give much, but I want what I can give to make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and/or sell their homes.

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: its something small that i can do for someone who really needs it. its nice to know that i can help....even if its just a little bit

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I want to help out- I was inspired by a class I had taken on women in international economic development and I thought to myself why not contribute.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: It's just a great idea. I am honored to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the internet, writing and finding information for a website about art. I also write short stories and novels.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: you would do the same for me
lender.occupational_info: i help manage the affairs of a company that makes children's books.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: Then the King will reply, "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you also did it for me." -- Matt 25:40

lender.name: Lightbearers
lender.occupational_info: We are all employees and alumni of a non-profit graduate school in Santa Monica, California, supporting and practicing the skills of spiritual psychology.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: "freely as I have been given freely I give." Jesus gave me my life back!!
lender.occupational_info: Architecture

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: God filled me with so much love that I cannot keep it to myself. I have to share that love with everyone. Everyone needs to be loved.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I love God

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I like the program and the ability to connect globally with someone who is motivated to pursue their dreams and be accountable for seeing it through.
lender.occupational_info: I provide support to pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies developing new medicines

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it encourages the entrepreneurial spirit

lender.name: Bil and Kathleen
lender.loan_because: WE see potential in hardworking people like yourselves to better your economic situation.
lender.occupational_info: We help people with a wide range of physical and psychological problems.

lender.name: Aldrea
lender.occupational_info: Managing software development

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a comfortable life, and feel that it is my moral obligation to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design, sell and build satellite communications networks.

lender.name: Yarkasi
lender.loan_because: want to start multimedia busines , Computer service, computer hard ware supplyer

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: People need help, and this is such a small thing to do.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care, because we are all human, and we are all life, and no one deserves to be deprived of any quality of life. I have everything I need, now it's time someone else did too!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student

lender.name: David & Margaret
lender.loan_because: It's a great chance to help others who have a need. We are both blessed & lucky - and have the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We have a few small businesses we have started (in New Zealand) - some are succeeding & the others aren't losing too much money ..

lender.name: Nick Brown
lender.loan_because: I won the Super Bowl pool at work and this is better than blowing it at Best Buy

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: Other people helped me, and now it is my turn to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I design office space. My specialty is interior office design, and most of my clients are small business owners.

lender.name: Caryn
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have and want to share. I trust that this method of sharing really makes a difference in the lives of people who receive the loans. I have loaned a little bit. If I see that is successful, I will loan more. And when that is repaid, loan it again. . .
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries--especially spine injuries--with manual therapy as well as exercise instruction. You can see where I work at www.balancept.org

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it can help improve life.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I have had many people help me and I am now able to give back to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with blood borne pathogens.

lender.name: Robinson House
lender.loan_because: Robinson House leads the way in fundraising!
lender.occupational_info: 87 boys ranging from Year 9 - 12 at Camberwell Grammar School

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do, and it makes me feel good.

lender.name: gad
lender.loan_because: i like to help if i can.

lender.name: Gørild
lender.loan_because: I have seen close up how little money is needed to get started with a small business in a development country, and the smile it puts on people's faces when they have work to go to and how good it feels to be able to provide basic things as food, clothes and toiletries to your own family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a translator and writer, and often work with information concerning the environment, international aid, tourism etc.

lender.name: jan christian
lender.loan_because: I want help people around the world improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have been emotionally hurt.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I can give financial support directly to those in need.

lender.name: Kali RS
lender.occupation: Non-Profit employee by day, Entrepreneur by night
lender.loan_because: Contributing to micro-financing means contributing to eradicating poverty - one person at a time! I am an entrepreneur too, and I believe that small business is the key to eliminating poverty. It makes me feel good to be able to help someone achieve their goals, even if I can't be there to help with my hands or my contacts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner who provides marketing services to small business owners (writing, editing, social media and consulting) in Calgary.

lender.name: Mr. Z
lender.loan_because: My dad would have felt it was important to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to guide the youth of America

lender.name: valerie and wendy
lender.loan_because: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.--George Bernard Shaw
lender.occupational_info: Teachers by profession. Students of life.

lender.name: Ray and Alison
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to help people who wish to help themselves and their families. I also want to teach my grandchild about giving.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for Coca Cola for many years in sales and distribution.

lender.name: Otso
lender.loan_because: Microfinance changes the world one person at a time.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping those that help themselves. Kiva does not take the place of pure charity but is a way of sharing person to person.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Giving shouldn't be limited to a traditonal avenues (i.e church).
lender.occupational_info: My daily job involves facilitating aid to disaster victims.

lender.name: Sougo
lender.loan_because: I want to assist in the person who challenges a bold target.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software researcher and engineer to think, find, and develop new communication software.

lender.name: Sheri & Pete
lender.loan_because: it is great to help whereever you can.
lender.occupational_info: We sit in a cubicle all day, far removed from a window or door shuffling paperwork. We both love gardening and cooking and working with our hands so it's not fun being stuck inside all day.

lender.name: Jason & Maggie
lender.whereabouts: San Francisco, CA & Denver, CO MA
lender.loan_because: if you have much, give of your wealth; if you have little, give of your heart (~Arabian proverb); OR give some of both by lending with Kiva

lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.occupational_info: my day job is teaching people how to improve their health by keeping their gums healthy. my night job is making jewelry using copper wire and stones to make jewelry; a portion of the proceeds from this hobby will fund my kiva account.

lender.name: Joanie
lender.loan_because: People are the most important thing.

lender.name: Dan & Beth
lender.loan_because: Why would we not?

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is good for humanity
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a economist

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I love to give back.

lender.name: Olusegun
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know the impact of not having enough money to run your business. Also, it is very important for humanity to reach out.
lender.occupational_info: If we all chip in, we can make a big difference in people's life

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We get by with a little help from our friends.

lender.name: Janža Krasnič
lender.loan_because: I simply love the entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out in anyway I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay-at-home mom who feels blessed to be able to do so.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact on the lives of others. If I can help a community through the passion of 1 person, imagine what that community can do for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a social entrepreneur, working to improve the lives of others in my community and those around me.

lender.name: HecLiz
lender.loan_because: It helps.

lender.name: matt
lender.occupational_info: Invest in early stage startups

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because:
Someone gave me a gift certificate for KIVA.
Then too, I was helped to start my business by a great many people with big hearts and want to repay the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a restaurant and rental houses and apartments.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe that no one should be prevented from being able to exploit opportunities to make their lives better
lender.occupational_info: I help public sector organizations improve their operations

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: it's nice to know that you're helping deserving people :) Thanks to a good friend of mine, Duane who gave me this idea.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have so much compared to many and I know how hard it can be for women in the world to feed and clothe their families. I read about SEWA Bank when I was an undergrad in Anthropology and was so impressed by the idea - I'm glad I can help in a small way - that I don't need to have hundreds of dollars to make a difference, and I am teaching my daughter about how easy it can be to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am first and foremost a mother and a wife. My main goal in life is to raise my daughter to make a difference. I am also a writer of children's fiction, as well as an executive assistant/office manager for an author/editor/agent who has worked with some of the world's great visionaries, such as Archbishop Desmond Tutu.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: If we don't help or assist who will. Plus it been a long time since i have done something good. I remember when my family needed assistance, so i do i have a understand that i should help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very busy and fast palce job. So i understand the need to help others.

lender.name: Gunvar
lender.loan_because: I think this is a greate way to help others make a living for themselfe and others.
lender.occupational_info: Im working as an Engineer in the Oil buissines

lender.name: Mat
lender.loan_because: I've witnessed first hand the power of entrepreneurship while working for ACCION International.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I loan to give others peace and hope.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own and operate a plumbing business. I also have 3 children and a nursing degree.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: Scripture says I should help the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise funds to help the poor and spread the Gospel in Peru.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you help others, you will in return receive blessings of your own, and you will grow to know yourself better.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves installing and maintaining digital radiology equipment in hospitals and clinics throughout the north east United States. I also am the founder of myrev.org, a website dedicated to inspiring people to make changes in their lives as well as those around them and throughout the world.

lender.name: Marc-Andre
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live in a trouble-free part of the world and this a great way for me to share this repeatedly.
lender.occupational_info: I find what makes people have fun and feel clever and skillful.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I can and this is something I believe in
lender.occupational_info: I am a figurative sculptor who uses cloth as my medium

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of capitalism and small business. I believe that people everywhere deserve a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Fenella
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping women in other areas of the world improve the circumstances of their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a team of people building a tram system in the capital of Scotland. I do a little bit of everything to help them do their job. I also try to help the team be friendly and happy.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of giving the average person the ability to help the owners of small businesses throughout the world with the loans they need to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a web developer, developing computer-based training courses.

lender.name: John & Katharine Armijo
lender.loan_because:
We will gladly help anyone that is willing to help themselves.
Obviously, people in other countries don't always have access to the priveleges that we do as Americans.
If we can share some of the fortunate priveleges we have access to with others, so be it!
We've been down and out before, and worked our way out of it. These people asking for help are in the same boat, and deserve a bit of support.
lender.occupational_info:
My wife and I own three business. My wife is a photographer, I run a business which sells collectables and movie memorabilia, and we own a childrens indoor playground.
We are on New Orleans Northshore, in St Tammany Parish.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: microloans have the ability to reduce poverty and increase self-esteem.

lender.name: Carie & Brittany
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance in life and if we can give that chance we will. We love the feeling of giving and helping.

lender.name: Unitarian Universalist
lender.loan_because: We are a congregation looking to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: We get involved in many community projects such as soup kitchens and peace vigils.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can and I should

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I try to be the change I want to see in the world.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think this is the very best way to make a difference in the lives of individuals, especially women trying to support themselves and their families. It makes me very happy to help in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: I spent most of my career working with kidney patients, but now work with rehabilitation patients, mostly recovering from knee and hip surgeries, strokes, and brain injuries.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families and raise their children out of poverty. Micro-finance is the most empowering way of doing that. Bravo Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 small children, and I work as a public relations consultant on large infrastructure projects.

lender.name: Jamal Hamou
lender.loan_because:
By taking on a loan a borrower develops confidence, motivation, and self respect. Outright gifts/aid fosters a dependent mindset which undermines personal development.
Empowering people to help themselves is the path to true and lasting prosperity.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful idea! Money I can spare may make a real difference in someone's life. Thank you Kiva for making this possible.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a recently retired medical technologist. I worked in a hospital laboratory, mostly testing blood.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: my husband and I have been privileged to travel around the world, and Kiva affords us to pay back the hospitality of the people we've met in many beautiful countries

lender.name: Forbes
lender.loan_because: I am able to and others have much less than I have.
lender.occupational_info: Corralling, lassoing, jumping up and down and occasionally, imparting a little knowledge or skill where it might be of use in the future.

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We should all try and give back if we can
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business.

lender.name: Wil
lender.loan_because: I admire people who work hard and strive to get ahead.

lender.name: Georgianna
lender.occupational_info: I do data entry, filing, and bookkeeping for a real estate appraisal firm owned by my two sons.

lender.name: Daggi
lender.loan_because: I care.
